person.persName: Lindsey A. Clifford (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Octavia Berry Clifford in Harrison County, Kentucky, on July 18, 1844. Father of Theophilus Clifford, Alonzo Clifford, Alvin Clifford, Ann Clifford, Melissa Clifford, Oscar Clifford, Adelaide Clifford, and Virginia Clifford. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Employed James Brusaw as a farmhand in Harrison County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1860.
